overview:
Hi

I am M Yakub Chowdhury Freelance Programmer and Trainer in Bangladesh.

I work for freelance projects like data entry, data extraction, data research, search engine optimization (seo), article marketing, link building, blog comment, social submission, etc at most competitive price.

I train for freelance jobs to freelance programmers so that they can get and do freelance job from home and earn money without facing any problem.

I will highly appreciate your comments and suggessions to make my stay in this forum effective.

Best regards
